pr_title: Allow user to pass in a display label.

timeline.message: Allow user to pass in a display label.

timeline.bodyText: since this option only applies to SubmitDepositCommand and TransformContentCommand, could you add the option directly to those to keep down the clutter in the --help option?
timeline.author: bbpennel
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -85,6 +85,11 @@
             description = "Port for redis. Default 6379.")
     protected int redisPort;
 
+    @Option(names = {"--display-label"},

timeline.message: Move display label option into the commands that use it directly
